resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104175</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104175</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206940</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">NIST in Your House</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">NIST in Ihrem Haus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">NIST dans votre Chambre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">NIST em sua casa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">NIST nella vostra Camera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">NIST στο σπίτι σας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">NIST en su casa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">illustrates the impact that the National Institute of Standards and Technology has on daily life. Visitors can read about the standards that help ensure the safety and suitability of construction materials, packaging, consumer electronics, home appliances, timing, cooling and heating equipment, and health products.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">veranschaulicht die Auswirkung, die das National 
Institute of Standards and Technology auf täglicher Lebensdauer hat. 
Besucher können über die Standards, die den lesen, stellen 
Hilfe die Sicherheit und die Eignung der Baumaterialien, des 
Verpackens, der Verbraucherelektronik, Haushaltsgeräte, 
Zeitbegrenzung sicher, abkühlend und der Heizung, und der Gesundheit 
Produkte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illustre l'impact que le National Institute of 
Standards and Technology a la vie quotidienne. Les visiteurs 
peuvent avoir connaissance des normes que cela l'aide assurent la 
sûreté et la convenance des matériaux de construction, empaquetant,
électronique grand public, appareils ménagers, synchronisation, 
matériel de refroidissement et de chauffage, et produits de santé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ilustra o impacto que o National Institute of 
Standards and Technology tem na vida diária. Os visitantes 
podem ler sobre os padrões que aquele a ajuda assegura a segurança e
o suitability de materiais de construção, empacotar, eletrônica de 
consumidor, dispositivos home, sincronismo, equipamento refrigerar e 
de heating, e produtos da saúde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illustra l'effetto che il National Institute of 
Standards and Technology ha su vita quotidiana. Gli ospiti 
possono leggere sugli standard che quello l'aiuto accerta la sicurezza
e l'idoneità dei materiali da costruzione, impaccare, elettronica di 
consumatore, elettrodomestici, la sincronizzazione, raffreddantesi ed 
apparecchio di riscaldamento e prodotto di salute.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επεξηγεί επίδραση που το εθνικό ίδρυμα προτύπων και 
τεχνολογίας ασκεί στην καθημερινή ζωή. Οι επισκέπτες 
μπορούν να διαβάσουν για τα πρότυπα που βοηθούν να εξασφαλίσουν 
την ασφάλεια και την καταλληλότητα των δομικών υλικών, της 
συσκευασίας, των ηλεκτρονικών ειδών ευρείας κατανάλωσης, των 
βασικών συσκευών, του εξοπλισμού συγχρονισμού, ψύξης και 
θέρμανσης, και των προϊόντων υγείας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ilustra el impacto que el National Institute of 
Standards and Technology tiene en vida de cada día. Los 
visitantes pueden leer sobre los estándares que eso la ayuda asegura 
la seguridad y la conveniencia de los materiales de construcción, 
empaquetado, electrónica de consumidor, los aparatos 
electrodomésticos, sincronización, equipo el refrescarse y de 
calefacción, y los productos de la salud.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206940</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104175</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/nist-in-your-house</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
